info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 11:15AM CDT until May 29 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Tombigbee River at Bigbee
For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Tombigbee River at Bigbee.
* WHEN...From late Tuesday night to early Thursday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying agricultural land is occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 13.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall to 12.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning to 15.2 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON
